coza.opencollab.synthesis.service.api.content

Interface ContentService


  • public interface ContentService
    The service to manage client content.
    Since:
    1.0.0
    Version:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    OpenCollab

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      SynchContent getContentSynch(String username, String moduleId, String toolName, String fromContentVersion)
      This will create a synch package for the user with the updates to the tool from the users version to the current version.
      long getContentSynchSize(String username, String moduleId, String toolName, String fromContentVersion)
      Get the size of the update for the tool from the given version to the current.
      void loadContent(String moduleId)
      Load the module to the content management.
      UpdateContent updateUserContent(String username, String moduleId, String toolName, Map<String,?> content, String originalContent)
      Updated the content for the tool for the user.

    • Method Detail

      • loadContent

        void loadContent(String moduleId)
        Load the module to the content management.
        Parameters:
        moduleId - The module id.

      • getContentSynch

        SynchContent getContentSynch(String username,
                           String moduleId,
                           String toolName,
                           String fromContentVersion)
        This will create a synch package for the user with the updates to the tool from the users version to the current version.
        Parameters:
        username - The username.
        moduleId - The module id.
        toolName - The tool name.
        fromContentVersion - The client's current tool content version.
        Returns:
        The synch data with the tool update.

      • getContentSynchSize

        long getContentSynchSize(String username,
                       String moduleId,
                       String toolName,
                       String fromContentVersion)
        Get the size of the update for the tool from the given version to the current.
        Parameters:
        username - The username.
        moduleId - The module id.
        toolName - The tool name.
        fromContentVersion - The from version, excluding.
        Returns:
        The approximation size in bytes.

      • updateUserContent

        UpdateContent updateUserContent(String username,
                              String moduleId,
                              String toolName,
                              Map<String,?> content,
                              String originalContent)
        Updated the content for the tool for the user.
        Parameters:
        username - The username.
        moduleId - The module id.
        toolName - The tool name.
        content - The user's content
        originalContent - a String object.
        Returns:
        The status of the update. Could also return extra data.
